argumentText:
ARGUMENT
i

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | esumcvg2.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | esumcvg2.a | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN ) -> A e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) |
| 3 |  | esumcvg2.l | |- ( k = l -> A = B ) |
| 4 |  | esumcvg2.m | |- ( k = m -> A = C ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_cbvesumv | |- sum* k e. ( 1 ... i ) A = sum* m e. ( 1 ... i ) C |
| 6 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( i = n -> ( 1 ... i ) = ( 1 ... n ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_esumeq1 | |- ( ( 1 ... i ) = ( 1 ... n ) -> sum* k e. ( 1 ... i ) A = sum* k e. ( 1 ... n ) A ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( i = n -> sum* k e. ( 1 ... i ) A = sum* k e. ( 1 ... n ) A ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_syl5eqr | |- ( i = n -> sum* m e. ( 1 ... i ) C = sum* k e. ( 1 ... n ) A ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_cbvmptv | |- ( i e. NN |-> sum* m e. ( 1 ... i ) C ) = ( n e. NN |-> sum* k e. ( 1 ... n ) A ) |
| 11 | 1, 10, 2, 3 | #P_esumcvg | |- ( ph -> ( i e. NN |-> sum* m e. ( 1 ... i ) C ) ( ~~>t ` J ) sum* k e. NN A ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl5eqbrr | |- ( ph -> ( n e. NN |-> sum* k e. ( 1 ... n ) A ) ( ~~>t ` J ) sum* k e. NN A ) |
